lines.i: The Immunization Medication Information represents product information about the immunization substance. The vaccine manufacturer and vaccine lot number are typically recorded in the medical record and should be included if known.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:9004, CONF:10499 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.54"
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:9005)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] manufacturerOrganization (CONF:9012)
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Organization

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial (CONF:9006)
This manufacturedMaterial SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Vaccines administered (CVX) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.934 STATIC 7 (CONF:9007)
This manufacturedMaterial SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] lotNumberText (CONF:9014)
This manufacturedMaterial code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:9008)
This manufacturedMaterial originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15555)
This manufacturedMaterial reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15556)
This manufacturedMaterial reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15557)
This manufacturedMaterial code MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translation (CONF:9011)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:9005)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] manufacturerOrganization (CONF:9012)
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Organization

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial (CONF:9006)
This manufacturedMaterial SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Vaccines administered (CVX) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.934 STATIC 7 (CONF:9007)
This manufacturedMaterial SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] lotNumberText (CONF:9014)
This manufacturedMaterial code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:9008)
This manufacturedMaterial originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15555)
This manufacturedMaterial reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15556)
This manufacturedMaterial reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15557)
This manufacturedMaterial code MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translation (CONF:9011)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <manufacturedproduct xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd" classCode="MANU"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.54"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1500471486"/> <manufacturedMaterial> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.59" codeSystemName="Vaccines administered (CVX)"/> <lotNumberText>TEXT FOR LOT NUMBER TEXT</lotNumberText> </manufacturedMaterial> <manufacturerOrganization/> </manufacturedproduct>
